Format Alignment Data

Source: R/tourSetlistAlignment.R
format_alignment_data.Rd

This function processes aligned setlist data and formats it into an alignment data frame with show IDs and encoded song sequences, including dashes for skipped songs.

Usage

format_alignment_data(aligned_setlists, codes_tour_songs, concert_data)

Arguments

aligned_setlists

A data frame containing aligned setlist information.

codes_tour_songs

A data frame containing song codes and hex characters.

concert_data

A data frame containing concert information including show IDs.

Value

A data frame with columns:

showID

Numeric identifier for each show

sequence

Character string representing the encoded song sequence
